dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Blue Sky
dmca.body:
Dr. Timothy David Cole 
Jonothan Robert Seele
BlueSky Partners, LLC. 
3023 N. Clark St., #184 
Chicago, IL 60657
November 21, 2006
 
Google, Inc. 
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam,

1. The copyrighted work at issue appears on http://www.truthaboutdeception.com. See the below table for specific infringements of our copyrighted material.

2. The infringing Web Pages on your system (Blogger.com) are located at http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/.
 
In particular, the user on your system has created several posts using our copyrighted content without our permission. The table below provides a reference to the URLs where the violations occurred. We have also captured electronic screen print copies of the pages in question.

URL of copied material Our copyrighted material
http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/2006/10/signs-of-cheating-why-you-lie-to.html
http://www.truthabotdeception.com/detecting_deceit/public/lying_comes_easy.html

http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/2006/10/can-you-tell-when-your-partner-is.html
http://www.truthabotdeception.com/detecting_deceit/public/nonverbal_cues.html

http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/2006/11/why-does-my-spouse-continue-to-cheat.html
http://www.truthabotdeception.com/question/quick_answer/once-cheater-always-cheater.html

http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/2006/09/cheating-signs-biggest-mistake-people.html
http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/2006/09/cheating-signs-biggest-mistake-people.html

http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/2006/10/truth-is-you-lie-so-much-i-bet-you.html
http://www.truthabotdeception.com/self-deception/public/self-deception.html

http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/2006/10/check-your-prescription-its-time-for.html
http://www.truthabotdeception.com/self-deception/public/selective_attention.html

http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/2006/10/want-truth-well-this-is-what-not-to.html
http://www.truthabotdeception.com/detecting_deceit/public/mistakes_to_avoid.html

3. Our full contact information is: 
Dr. Timothy David Cole 
Jonothan Robert Seele 
BlueSky Partners, LLC 
3023 N. Clark St., #184 
Chicago, IL 60657
773-517-0219
webmaster@truthaboutdeception.com
 
4. We request that the infringing content at http://cheatingsigns.blogspot.com/ be immediately removed from your system.

5. We have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. We swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that we are the copyright owner or we are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
Sincerely, 

Dr. Timothy David Cole
Jonothan Robert Seele 
BlueSky Partners, LLC 
3023 N. Clark St., #184 
Chicago, IL 60657 
773-517-0219
webmaster@truthaboutdeception.com
